content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-11.5, 18.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine at position(-11.5, 18.5)
- Boiler at position(-11.5, 25.0)
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5, 24.5)

### Copper plate factory at position(0, 0) and (5, 5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (stone-furnace) at position(0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace (stone-furnace) at position(5.0, 5.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into furnaces. In this case, there was an attempt to insert iron ore into the second furnace without having any iron ore in the inventory.

### Errors related to smelting timeout
- Check that all furnaces have sufficient fuel and inputs before waiting for them to smelt. The error indicates that one or both furnaces may not have the necessary resources to operate effectively.
